creator: jhuang@idncn.com
text:
The below works well under ant1.5.1, but <metainf> not work under ant1.5.2.
<jar destfile="${basedir}/../${path.oamejb.jar}"
     basedir="${EjbDir}"
     includes="**/*.class"
     duplicate="fail"
     index="true">
    <manifest>
        <attribute name="Built-By" value="${manifest.vendor}"/>
        <attribute name="Built-Time" value="${TODAY}"/>
    </manifest>
    <metainf dir="${JavaSrcDir}">
        <include name="ejb-jar.xml"/>
        <include name="jboss.xml"/>
    </metainf>
</jar>

Thanks.

Checking with WinZIP?  Please try 1.5.3beta1.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 17648 ***
creator: bodewig@apache.org
